attributes.review: DO NOT download this app! Immediately after downloading I received non-stop notifications and a warning that my phone had a virus. Turns out the trump administration doesn’t know how to handle viruses of any type >:(
attributes.title: Gave My Phone a Virus!

attributes.review: this app is always slow and it makes my phone glitch so much to the point where i had to just get a completely new sim card.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and when it was loading it kicked me out of the app and my phone went black and now I can’t fix it is there anyways to get it fixed?
attributes.title: Broke my phone

attributes.review: saying it’s a joke it’s actually insulting to jokes. This app triggered my camera to come in to take pictures of me all throughout the day... and I haven’t had my hair done or makeup on in months! This app is terrible and disgusting and it needs to be deleted!!!
attributes.title: HONESTLY A JOKE OF AN APP

attributes.review: This app gave me nightmares and carpal tunnel because it’s so difficult to use It’s meant for a touch screen devise but the app doesn’t move with the finger motions. At night it just opens up by it -self and wakes me up by playing a hateful remix of the national anthem.
attributes.title: The worst app ever

attributes.review: The app crashes every time I try to open it. Even when it's closed in the background it drains my battery and ends up killing my phone. Horrible and do not recommend at all
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: When I opened the app is said it could sense I was women and that I needed a males permission to use this app and then I should go back in to the kitchen and make a sandwich which upset me very much. If I could u would give this app zero starts.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: this app literally gets me so dissapointed that our so called "president" has this horrible looking app out for all of us to download😔 ???? what a shame and disgrace i am so dissapointed with what they have made 😠. this just supports his beliefs like racisms and homophobia and pedophilism. i advice the apple store to remove this app so we never have to have it see this horrible app ever again. 😚 trump really tried ✨💓 but he better not try again 😌❤️🦋
attributes.title: worst app i have ever seen

attributes.review: This is the worst fake news I’ve ever seen. It told me that the world was going to end tomorrow, snakes are actually potatoes and a bunch more. Also in the terms and conditions you agree that this app can take control of your life. Worst app I’ve ever seen.
attributes.title: TERRBILE

attributes.review: I would not recommend downloading this app. As soon as I downloaded it, my phone crashed and now my entire phone is useless. Now all of my apps crash and I my phone is basically a brick. THANKS TRUMP it’s all your fault
attributes.title: Worst app in HISTORY
